note: UK, London. Socialist, active trade unionist, community activist. Stand for Climate, Economic and Racial Justice. ME/CFS

fields.name: Streets Kitchen
fields.value: Volunteer with this fabulous group who give 'Solidarity not Charity' in various locations across London

fields.name: Politics
fields.value: A socialist, still in the Labour Party. Member of Momentum and at demos, protesting against inequalities in society
